title: New: Anna von Hausswolff – Deathbed
body:
We’re checking in again with Swedish songstress **Anna von Hausswollf**.

After the release of her lastest albumin her homeland a few months back, Hausswollf has now teamed up with Berlin-based label City Slang to bring the record to the rest of Europe. **_Ceremony_**is coming out on June 13th, and in celebration of this the label have posted epic album track _Deathbed _up on soundcloud. It’s pretty huge – cut nine minutes out of your day, and give it a listen below.
